story_parts.text: One day, a lion went to the city. He was very excited to see all the tall buildings and busy people. He walked around for a while, taking everything in. Suddenly, he heard a loud noise. It was a car horn! The lion was so startled that he ran away. He didn't want to be in the city anymore. He was happy to be back in the safety of the jungle.

next_options.0: The lion decided he liked the city and decided to stay
next_options.1: The lion was so scared that he vowed never to come back

story_parts.text: The lion decided he liked the city and decided to stay. He found a nice spot to sleep in and watch the people. He liked the hustle and bustle of the city and felt at home there.

next_options.0: The lion soon got tired of the city and missed the open plains
next_options.1: The lion became a local celebrity

story_parts.text: The lion soon got tired of the city and missed the open plains. He missed the sound of the wind and the smell of the grass. One day, he walked out of the city and never looked back. He was happy to be back in the wild where he belonged.

next_options.0: The lion found a mate and started a family
next_options.1: The lion met a group of other lions and formed a pride

story_parts.text: The lion found a mate and started a family. He was happy to have a family of his own and to be back in the wild. His family was happy too, and they all lived happily ever after.

next_options.0: The lion and his family live happily ever after in the wild
next_options.1: The lion's family is captured by humans and taken to a zoo

quiz_parts.question: What did the lion find in the city?

options.1: a place to watch the people
options.2: the hustle and bustle of the city
